item.title: 香港：这场戏真好看！欸？为什么枪口对准我了。[150-200]
item.description:
香港：这场戏真好看！欸？为什么枪口对准我了。 CNN：
In his opening remarks, CECC chair James McGovern, a Democratic congressman, said he believed "it is time for the United States to consider new and innovative policies to support the people of Hong Kong."
McGovern and others have suggested Washington review the US-Hong Kong Policy Act of 1992, under which it treats the city as a separate customs territory to the rest of China, so long as Hong Kong remains "sufficiently autonomous." Suspending Hong Kong's special status could devastate the city's economy and also hit Beijing hard, given its reliance on Hong Kong's financial sector.
机翻：
民主党国会议员，CECC主席詹姆斯麦戈文在致开幕辞时说，他认为“现在是时候让美国考虑采取新的创新政策来支持香港人”。
麦戈文和其他人建议华盛顿审查1992年的美国 - 香港政策法案，根据该法案，只要香港保持“足够自治”，它就将该城市视为中国其他地区的单独关税区。
由于依赖香港的金融业，暂停香港的特殊地位可能会破坏该市的经济，并对北京造成严重打击。

这个对台湾的打击也不小，韩国瑜天天说搞台湾自贸区可以发大财，蔡英文就警告美国不会让台湾赚这个洗货钱，到时候台湾货被视为中国货一体看待，就完蛋了

item.title: 香港：这场戏真好看！欸？为什么枪口对准我了。[50-100]
item.description:
香港：这场戏真好看！欸？为什么枪口对准我了。 CNN：
In his opening remarks, CECC chair James McGovern, a Democratic congressman, said he believed "it is time for the United States to consider new and innovative policies to support the people of Hong Kong."
McGovern and others have suggested Washington review the US-Hong Kong Policy Act of 1992, under which it treats the city as a separate customs territory to the rest of China, so long as Hong Kong remains "sufficiently autonomous." Suspending Hong Kong's special status could devastate the city's economy and also hit Beijing hard, given its reliance on Hong Kong's financial sector.
机翻：
民主党国会议员，CECC主席詹姆斯麦戈文在致开幕辞时说，他认为“现在是时候让美国考虑采取新的创新政策来支持香港人”。
麦戈文和其他人建议华盛顿审查1992年的美国 - 香港政策法案，根据该法案，只要香港保持“足够自治”，它就将该城市视为中国其他地区的单独关税区。
由于依赖香港的金融业，暂停香港的特殊地位可能会破坏该市的经济，并对北京造成严重打击。

hk自主权过高导致很多hker一直有种错觉，就是别人怕他们怎样怎样，然而事实上，在hk毕业去个uk还要考雅思的情况下，hk实质上是两面不讨好，大陆开始烦他们，英国佬又瞧不起这种非五眼地区

item.title: 香港：这场戏真好看！欸？为什么枪口对准我了。[0-50]
item.description:
香港：这场戏真好看！欸？为什么枪口对准我了。 CNN：
In his opening remarks, CECC chair James McGovern, a Democratic congressman, said he believed "it is time for the United States to consider new and innovative policies to support the people of Hong Kong."
McGovern and others have suggested Washington review the US-Hong Kong Policy Act of 1992, under which it treats the city as a separate customs territory to the rest of China, so long as Hong Kong remains "sufficiently autonomous." Suspending Hong Kong's special status could devastate the city's economy and also hit Beijing hard, given its reliance on Hong Kong's financial sector.
机翻：
民主党国会议员，CECC主席詹姆斯麦戈文在致开幕辞时说，他认为“现在是时候让美国考虑采取新的创新政策来支持香港人”。
麦戈文和其他人建议华盛顿审查1992年的美国 - 香港政策法案，根据该法案，只要香港保持“足够自治”，它就将该城市视为中国其他地区的单独关税区。
由于依赖香港的金融业，暂停香港的特殊地位可能会破坏该市的经济，并对北京造成严重打击。
item.content:encoded:
HMSWarspite:
香港：这场戏真好看！欸？为什么枪口对准我了。
CNN：
In his opening remarks, CECC chair James McGovern, a Democratic congressman, said he believed "it is time for the United States to consider new and innovative policies to support the people of Hong Kong."
McGovern and others have suggested Washington review the US-Hong Kong Policy Act of 1992, under which it treats the city as a separate customs territory to the rest of China, so long as Hong Kong remains "sufficiently autonomous." Suspending Hong Kong's special status could devastate the city's economy and also hit Beijing hard, given its reliance on Hong Kong's financial sector.
机翻：
民主党国会议员，CECC主席詹姆斯麦戈文在致开幕辞时说，他认为“现在是时候让美国考虑采取新的创新政策来支持香港人”。
麦戈文和其他人建议华盛顿审查1992年的美国 - 香港政策法案，根据该法案，只要香港保持“足够自治”，它就将该城市视为中国其他地区的单独关税区。
由于依赖香港的金融业，暂停香港的特殊地位可能会破坏该市的经济，并对北京造成严重打击。
